Short well-presented documentary-style presentations of actual crimes solved using forensic science. The skillful reenactments lend drama to the presentations. Most of the stories are quite interesting. They also honor dedicated police work by both the cops and the lab guys.
A CLASSIC!

great tv shows, if anyone out there wants to kill someone think twice...forensics tells on all and doesn't make up stories, and there is no "perfect murder"

Near the end of "Purebread Murder" the narrator claims she was "the victim of her own trusting nature..."

Uh. Nooo...

She was the victim of the murderer, not herself. Let's keep the blame where it belongs, shall we? Dang it.

Also, the "information" is brazenly presented in such a way that's meant to toy with your head (of course)...Cheap, overused, lazy production tactic...Kind of lets you know how seriously you can take programs like this.

Useful for procrastinating, though.

enjoy watching real life events, heart felt seies life these tv episodes need to be reviewed.  Criminals should be caught and be brought to justice for
their crimes.  Most criminals should serve life without parole.  These people who live in the United States, or from other countries, do not think about
the crime until it's to late and will run, cover up and hide their crime.  It may take yeats or not months.  Evendents and cues thats left behind, with the
vast technologies, forensic Doctors look into the case.  Detectives will be on top of the case day in and out to bring closure to families and love ones.

I tragedy happen in my family, I will want the same closure for justice.  Yes, people makes mistakes, but need to be accountable for what they do in
their life.  We live free, stay free, and make decison to be crime free.  We should not take another life, and yes we are only human.

I might not watch this on regular tv with commercials.  As it is on Amazon, commercial free, I really like it.  Stories are told with a little melodrama, but I like the narrator's voice.  For anyone with a layperson's interest in forensic science,  this is the show for you.

A great series that highlights the groundbreaking technology used to solve crimes.  Kind of interesting to see the cases that pioneered techniques we take for granted today.

This was one of first real crime documentaries on television.  It has always been one of my favorites.  Season 14 was outstanding in detail selection, direction and drama.  The director was not afraid to tell the story or share the awful details of murder and the inhumanity of man against man.  The series will bring tears of grief and joy in the celebration of the capture of the culprits.  I fully recommend this adult entertainment.
love it
I like that each episode is only about 22 minutes. Keeps my interest, so I have watched all the Seasons.

Something interesting to watch/listen to while I knit.  Pretty good show to see how murders are solved.  Also explains the motivation behind the murder.  I would be interested in watching the other seasons of this show too.

These are like most of the rest of the Forensic Files series.  Different cases of course.  I wished they were a bit more balanced in the cases they choose.  Essentially 78% of all murder victims are men, but it seems like 95% (I'm guessing here) of the cases shown are female victims.  Maybe the ones where the women are victims are more interesting.  Don't know.  I'm sure tracking the killer down with science is interesting regardless of the gender of the victim.  So why do we have it more representative of the truth?

That's why I give it 3 stars.
This show has been a favorite since I was 12 years old! I'm 27 now... I've watched all the available episodes on TV and now I get to watch episodes from season 1. Love it!
Really good not have the endless repeating of every detail from the previous scene

It's still good and interesting to see how forensics have improved. However, after this many seasons of seeing the worst of the worst horrible people, it's getting easier to spot the low-life bums even sooner. Ex-boyfriends, ex-husbands, jealous boyfriends, jealous husbands, girlfriend, husbands tired of their wives, wives tired of their husbands, greedy conspiracy plans. Somebody always wants something they don't have and are not willing to work for it. Instead they get to spend the rest of their lives in prison.
